entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Near blizzard developing after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
